item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an integer overflow or wraparound, which could Â allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0755|2024-08-02T05:24:34.155Z -- ptc -- thingworx%20edge%20c-sdk
item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an improper validation of array index, which could allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.
